评论概述: Thick and warm sweater in lilac.
评论详情: This is a nice thick sweater for cold weather.  It is soft enough I don’t need to wear another layer under it if I don’t want to.  I am tall and it is the perfect length and the sleeves are long enough for my arms. I machine wash and line dry and it comes out great.  I will consider buying an additional one in another color.

This is a beautiful sweater, soft, cozy,and substantial. It does run large in my opinion. Generally I’m on the smaller side of a medium so I bought the medium because I wanted an oversized fit. It is definitely oversized- I probably could have gotten the small and been fine. The design is only on the front. I’m going to order another but in a small next time.
My niece was happy.

It's a nice sweater. Thick and cozy and warm.  That being said the color is NOT as pictured. I ordered the pink which looked like a soft baby pink when viewed online. What I received was a muddy sort of lavender/mauve color. Disappointing.

I was so looking forward to getting this sweater. It finally arrived and when I opened it I was surprised that the material was not what I expected. I can't really describe it but it wasn't sweater-like. Also, it was huge in the shoulders. I didn't like it, so I gave it away.

This is for a very cold weather. very thick and well made. I ordered XS and I'm 4"11 and 110 lbs. I love the material and not itchy. i just hope it's a little bit shorter on the length so if I tuck it in it will not be so bulky but perfect to wear leggings.
Nice

This sweater is gorgeous.  The green color is chefs kiss.  I am returning because I sized down based on other reviews and the medium did not give me the oversized look that I wanted.  I definitely would have preferred a large or even an XL.  That being said, the other reason I am returning is because the material was a static nightmare.  It would drive me insane so I would never wear it.  It's a bummer because it's a stunning sweater.  The material did not feel itchy as others had mentioned.  Would be great if you lived in an area that didn't have as much dry winter air (like Texas).
5’7 , 148 lbs , purchased a size Medium. Beautiful color , fabric is soft and not itchy, and length is good to wear with leggings!

I got a medium and it was definitely the perfect fit for a slightly oversized sweater for work! It’s 21 degrees where I live and I walked out of my house and didn’t even need a jacket because it so thick and warm! It is a little itchy but it’s not very noticeable. I love the oversized look and I’ve been getting compliments on it left and right! The color is a little lighter than I was hoping but I still love it!
Nice weight for Winter in the East. Dry flat , NO dryer!
exactly what my daughter wanted !  great price and quality
Soft, comfortable sweater. Surprised how thick it was. Great for cold weather!

This sweater has a little bit of room, but not nearly as much as I would want from an oversized sweater.

The sweater is very good quality. It’s thick. Feels soft to the touch. I read the reviews and saw that most people say it’s true to size. So instead of going with my gut and buying a larger size, I bought a medium. And I feel I should’ve bought the large. I’m 5’3, 159 lbs. my bottom half is a little heavier then it use to be.  So I like all my tops to be loose. the hole for the head was so small that I had to squeeze so hard to get the hole to stretch around my tiny head. There wasn’t enough looseness around the hips imo, so I feel the large would be better.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for!
评论详情: I went with a M as I saw they tended to run big.  It's so soft and cuddly and I love that the cable pattern is on both the front and back.  Would definitely buy again in other colors.

Very well made sweater. It is a heavier sweater but not heavy enough to go without a coat in 40 or colder temperatures which depends on each individuals tolerance of cold. I am 5’5 and weigh 171 lbs. I typically order a 2X because I love my clothing baggie. After reading other reviews I thought I’d order XL which fit comfortably on me. I did not find it to be overly baggie as other reviews stated. I found it fit like an XL with a little extra length in sleeves. It goes below my waist and cover part of my butt but not as overly sized as I had hoped. I personally wouldn’t feel comfortable wearing leggings with it considering the length. I wished I would have gotten the 2X but I’m keeping the XL because it fits very nicely and is loose but not ridiculously loose that I like.
It’s roomy and cozy and the material is soft. It’s great for layering
Beautiful sweater.  Runs big but I like a baggy fit.  I got a large and could've used a med. but I still kept it.  Very well made and soft. Washed nicely!

Sweater is beautiful but there is an extremely itchy component in the yarn that despitemultiple washings remains making the sweater unebearable. It fit well true to size — but is so itchy it cannot be worn even with a shirt under it.

This sweater is nice for a synthetic material. It’s a little stretchy, lays nicely. I suggest a size up for the oversized look. It’s warm too. Washed well.
Thick, warm, cozy white color. I love it! 😍

I bought this because I am a huge Gilmore Girls fan and the reviews were good. I like the look of the sweater. I bought a medium so it would fit very large and I could roll up the sleeves like it does on Rory in the show. The fit is perfect for that (I am 5 ft, 132 pounds). My only complaint is how itchy it feels on my skin. I wear an undershirt but it feels itchy on my arms and my neck. It’s wearable, but not enjoyable for my experience so I have it four stars. Guess k just have to do it for the fashion, nostalgia lol

This sweater isn't as large as I thought it would be when I ordered a Large, but it is roomy and the sleeves are long enough, which is always an issue for me. It's soft and I don't need to wear a shirt under it. Definitely recommend. I bought it in 2 colors.

This sweater is thick! The quality is amazing. The fabric have a bit of weight to them so it doesn’t feel cheap. I have only wear this with a thermal shirt so I’m unsure how itchy it would be just by itself. I got two different colors and I get so many compliments on them. For me, (5’1, 100lbs) the small is a little bigger on me, but I like baggy sweater anyway. Though I wish it was slightly smaller.

I was really skeptical about this sweater as it is kind of pricey, so it sat in my wishlist for a year and a half. I am going on a trip in a few weeks and needed more warm clothes, so i decided to go for it. By far the best sweater I have ever owned, so pretty and very warm! I got the light blue color
This sweater is just as lovely as my designer sweaters.
I bought one of these sweaters for myself and liked it so much that I've given it to two friends as well!  They both love it.

I love this sweater! It's a heavier weight, the stitching is beautiful, and it's not scratchy. I ordered the small. I normally am a medium but sized down for this since it specified it's oversized. Just wish they had an emerald or forest green option, because I would come back for a second one!

I normally like sweaters oversized but I sized down with this one (to a Large) and it’s absolutely perfect. It’s so soft, heavy, but not too hot and I’m in love with the shade of green I chose. If they go on sale again I’d buy another one
